content: कुंडलिन् (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Decorated with ear-rings. {@--2@} Circular, spiral. {@--3@} Winding, coiling (as a serpent). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A snake. {@--2@} A peacock. {@--3@} An epithet of Varuṇa, and of Śiva. {@--4@} The spotted or painted deer. --नी A form of Durgā or Śakti.
